name: The great chasm
description:
A single level puzzlescript game about crossing a giant pit.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=89a67005314d9dbeb4c7382c463096c6

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=89a67005314d9dbeb4c7382c463096c6

Chasm: https://rosden.itch.io/chasm

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)

(I had less time to work on my game today than usual and I couldn't for the life of me come up with an idea. So I cobbled this together but I'm not particularly happy with it )
